本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: (Skt. Saddharmapundarīka-sūtra) J. A statement of Mahayana doctrine important in Japanese Buddhism. It contains many well-known parables and other stories. [Can also be read Hokkekyō]
